attributes.action: TO STOP RE-ASSESING THE PEOPLE ON DLA WHO ALREADY HAVE A DIFFICULT LIFE AND STOP ANY FURTHER UNDUE STRESS
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to ask that the government dept of work and pensions stop asking people on DLA to again go through further testing and interviews, as it only causes further undue stress and can cause people with certain neurological and mental illneses to become increasingly worse plus there is the added strain on the carers and the NHS
